items.title: Upload Video
items.description: Drag and drop or select to upload your video file. Supported formats include MP4, AVI, and MOV.

items.title: Instant Reversal
items.description: Our technology quickly processes your video, reversing playback while maintaining quality.

items.description: Preview and download the reversed video, ready to share or keep.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emily Brown
items.comment: The reverse feature is magic! I've used it for all my vlogs and the results are incredible.

items.name: David Lee

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Discover answers to common queries about our video reversing feature

items.title: What types of videos can I reverse?
items.description: You can reverse various video formats, including MP4, AVI, and MOV. Our AI efficiently handles any content you upload.

items.title: Is the video reversing service free?
items.description: Absolutely! Every user gets daily access to free video reversals, with opportunities to enhance your limits through user engagement.

items.title: Can I use reversed videos commercially?
items.description: Yes, users on subscription plans can use their reversed videos for commercial purposes, while free-tier users are limited to personal use.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All processing takes place in your browser, preventing your videos from being uploaded or stored on external servers, ensuring complete privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Reverse Your Videos?
